objects.text:
• Powerful Motor Performance
• 3 Versatile Stainless Steel Jars
• Multiple Speed Settings
• Perfect for Indian Cooking

product_details.name: Sujata Dynamix Power Mixer Grinder - 3 Jars | Premium Kitchen Powerhouse
product_details.description:
• Powerful motor for efficient grinding and mixing performance
• Comes with 3 versatile stainless steel jars for different grinding needs
• Transparent dome-shaped lids with measuring cup functionality
• Ergonomic jar handles for comfortable grip and pouring
• Speed control dial with multiple settings (Low, Med, High)
• Durable stainless steel blades for consistent grinding
• Sturdy white ABS body construction for long-lasting use
• Safety-lock mechanism for secure operation
• Ideal for wet & dry grinding, chutney making, and blending
• Compact design perfect for modern kitchens
• Easy to clean and maintain
• Perfect for Indian cooking needs
• Anti-skid feet for stable operation
• Overload protection for motor safety

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and clean grid-based layout divided into four quadrants using a diagonal line-cross background design, overlaid with a gradient of soft to bold hues. The top-left quadrant showcases the product's name using two bold heading layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2"), complemented by a subtitle ("subheading") and an energetic tagline ("tagline"). The bottom-left quadrant presents key product features ("description"), the price tag in large bold text ("price"), and a clear call-to-action button styled with contrasting colors ("cta_background" and "cta"). The right half visually focuses on the product image ("product_image") and a concise slogan ("slogan") at the bottom-right. The hierarchical typography and structured alignment guide the viewer’s attention logically.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #1E3A8A (primary heading/text emphasis)
- Royal Blue: #2B5797 (subtitle and line details)
- Sky Blue: #E8F4FD (background)
- Electric Blue: #0078D7 (feature section background/accent circles)
- Light Gray: #DEDEDE (product highlight zone)
- Bright Orange: #E65100 (CTA and tagline emphasis)
- White: #FFFFFF (text and transparent circle overlays)
product_color: This product image of a mixer grinder uses a clean and modern color palette dominated by metallic silver and matte white, giving it a sleek and premium appeal. The primary colors include Glossy White (#F4F4F4), Chrome Silver (#C0C0C0), and Transparent Grey (#A9A9A9) used in the jars and lids. Accents like Cool Steel Blue (#B0BEC5) for the handles and Vibrant Purple (#8E44AD) on the control knob add a pop of color without overwhelming the visual balance. The colors blend seamlessly with a mix of matte and glossy textures, giving dimension and highlighting product features, while maintaining visual harmony.
